categories: Category:Star Wars radio and audio drama voice actors
Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Rebecca Soler (born August 24, 1976) is a voice actress known for her roles in animation. Her roles have included a regular role as Alexa and several other varying roles in the Pokémon franchise, the character of Sarah in Chaotic and Joi Reynard in the 2006 version of the popular franchise Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Soler was also the narrator for the audio editions of Marissa Meyer's Cinder series.

Soler, along with Star Wars veteran Marc Thompson, is the reader of the audio edition of the title A New Hope: The Princess, the Scoundrel, and the Farm Boy. Soler also voiced characters in Star Wars: The Old Republic. Prior to the announcement of Soler's involvement in The Princess, the Scoundrel and the Farm Boy, Soler stated in an interview when asked if she had a favorite audiobook narrator, "If you want to be blown away by someone who can narrate a million different characters with ungodly specificity, listen to Marc Thompson narrate the Star Wars series. He is a vocal beast."
In addition, Soler portrayed Yula Braylon in Dooku: Jedi Lost and was the voice of Qo'el in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
